title: JSON schema for Azure Functions host.json files

id.description: The unique ID for this job host. Can be a lower case GUID with dashes removed

functions.description: The list of functions the host should load.

functionTimeout.description: Value indicating the timeout duration for all functions.

routePrefix.description: Defines the default route prefix that applies to all routes. Use an empty string to remove the prefix.

watchDirectories.description: Set of shared code directories that should be monitored for changes to ensure that when code in these directories is changed, it is picked up by your functions

maxPollingInterval.description: The maximum interval in milliseconds between queue polls.

batchSize.description: The number of queue messages to retrieve and process in parallel (per job function).

maxDequeueCount.description: The number of times to try processing a message before moving it to the poison queue

newBatchThreshold.description: The threshold at which a new batch of messages will be fetched. The default is batchSize/2.

maxConcurrentCalls.description: The maximum number of concurrent calls to the callback the message pump should initiate.

prefetchCount.description: The default PrefetchCount that will be used by the underlying MessageReceiver.

maxBatchSize.description: The maximum event count received per receive loop.

prefetchCount.description: The default PrefetchCount that will be used by the underlying EventProcessorHost.

consoleLevel.description: The tracing level used for console logging.

fileLoggingMode.description: Value determining what level of file logging is enabled.

singleton.description: Configuration settings for Singleton lock behavior.

lockPeriod.description: The period that function level locks are taken for (they will auto renew).

listenerLockPeriod.description: The period that listener locks are taken for.

listenerLockRecoveryPollingInterval.description: The time interval used for listener lock recovery if a listener lock couldn't be acquired on startup.

lockAcquisitionTimeout.description: The maximum amount of time the runtime will try to acquire a lock.

lockAcquisitionPollingInterval.description: The interval between lock acquisition attempts.
